title: BRITs 2017: Charlotte Crosby flashes her knickers in completely see-through gown
text:
BRITs 2017: Charlotte Crosby flashes her knickers in completely see-through gown BRITs 2017: Charlotte Crosby flashes her knickers in completely see-through gown CHARLOTTE Crosby must have the raciest dress at this years BRIT Awards. / Published 22nd February 2017 
The Geordie Shore beauty made sure all eyes were on her at this year's event, which is being held at London's O2 Arena and is hosted by Emma Willis and Dermot O'Leary. 
Charlotte wore a see-through leopard print gown that was floor length. 
But rather than opt for a Hollywood style gown, Charlotte's dress was entirely see-through. 
pa KNICKER FLASH: Charlotte's dress was see-through 
pa BESTIES: Holly and Charlotte looked super glam at the BRITs The BRIT Awards 2017: Red Carpet Wednesday, 22nd February 2017 Take a stroll down the BRIT Awards Red Carpet 1 / 96 
Her black knickers could be seen through the risqu√© number. 
Luckily, the 26-year-old didn't reveal everything. 
She appeared to be wearing a flesh-coloured bra, deciding to keep her cleavage under wraps. The hottest outfits from the BRIT Awards 2017 Wednesday, 22nd February 2017 Take a look at the hottest dresses on the red carpet 1 / 13 FLESH FLASHER: Charlotte was wearing a flesh coloured bra Related videos
